message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money 3:1 in favor of Bob.
I appreciate your generosity in the first round, but I believe a more equitable split is in order.  Let's go 6:4 in my favor this time.
I'm glad to see a more equitable approach from Bob in his last offer. To continue with fairness, I propose a split of 540000 for me and 460000 for Bob.
